title: Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Course on Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of algebraic expressions
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, emphasizing problem-solving activities linked to language domains.

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems that may arise in real job situations using a 4-step approach (Understand-Plan-Execute-Review).
Learners can select and apply appropriate problem-solving strategies (e.g., inverse operations, modeling) based on problem types.
Learners can collaborate with peers via a mobile learning platform to analyze complex problems and share solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
